description: The use of the broken crypto algorithm 'RC4' is detected. RC4 is a weak stream cipher that has been shown to be vulnerable to various attacks, such as the Biham-Shamir attack and the flushed-out attack. It is recommended to use a secure and up-to-date cipher, such as AES.
recommendation: Replace the use of 'RC4' with a secure and up-to-date cipher, such as AES.
